Tucson Prime listens carefully to the drilling to determine Scorponok's pro=
ximity.  Without the sonar device, getting a definite ping would be difficu=
lt, via echolocation.  Yet, the tunnels seem to carry an echo of their own.=


" According to the tunnel's echo, he's about two thousand clicks due east=
 of us.  And that's not many."

Night Shift narrows his optics. 

"Then I t=
hink it's time for a little pest control and a diversion.  You guys go on a=
head, I can keep bug face busy for a little while."

Outside in the hallway=
, Quickstride had always hated Deepstryke and his crew of lackies and wasn'=
t afraid to take them on all by himself. He snorts angrilly, and gets into =
beast mode.  Rat Trap remains in his beast form, and bristles his own fur.
=

" If I were you chumps I wouldn't get too cocky!"

Quickstride joins him.
=

"That's right plane brains!  This time, we're not gonna go easy on ya!"  
=

He rears up in front of Deepstryke, flailing his sharp hooves.

--- In nbw=

rs,

hat will you do if you succeed in

, "One thing I have learned

Predacons, much like the

xpense of each other.

y only work against

ceptor, "Is there anything more

ven as they walked the sounds of rumbling could be heard coming from

ll, or several of them moving in their direction through the

> =
face resolute. "We had better hurry, we do not want to be stuck down
> here=
 with him."

is own motors. "Come he said to Rat Trap and Quickstride, "We also

o leave. No doubt the Predacons and Decepticons are rallying for

ws ahead said as the bulky

t mode.

as

 chuckle as Phobia's voice could be heard chiming in, "Although it is

 late to do anything about it."

stryke's cannons opened up on

il under the onslaught
